body.name: NUK Simply Natural Baby Bottle with SafeTemp, Girl, 9 Oz, 4 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Multiple nipple holes provide a natural feed, just like mom’s breast
Features NUK’s SafeTemp indicator, which changes color when milk is too hot
Nipple comes with 3, 6, or 9 holes, depending on flow rate
5-oz. bottle comes with slow flow nipple that has 3 holes, 9-oz. comes with medium flow nipple that has 6 holes
Advanced 1-piece Anti-Colic Air Vent helps reduce colic, gas, and spit up
Same shape as mom’s nursing nipple during breastfeeding
Flexible nipple moves with baby for a continuous latch
Odor- & stain-resistant crystal-clear Tritan bottle is BPA-free and is easy to use, assemble, & clean
Available in boy, girl, and gender-neutral fashions
body.description: Now your baby can transition from breast to bottle in a natural way with the NUK® Simply Natural™ Bottles. Designed to mimic the fit, flow, and movement of mom as closely as possible, this is the only bottle with up to 9 nipple holes, just like mom. This provides a natural feeding experience to ensure the mom-baby bond remains strong. NUK® Simply Natural™ bottles feature a super-soft nipple that mimics the shape of mom's breast while breastfeeding. The scoop nipple cavity allows space for baby's tongue and jaw to move naturally, just like they do when breastfeeding. Now NUK® Simply Natural™ bottles feature SafeTemp technology, which lets you know when milk is too hot. The blue thermometer indicator fades when milk is too hot and reappears when milk has cooled and is safe to drink.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us For more than 70 years, NUK has designed and developed the high quality products that are innovative to support your child’s safe and development. We offer a wide range of baby bottles, including our Smooth Flow Anti-Colic Bottles and Simply Natural Bottles, with bottle nipples for all stages of development. Our beloved NUK orthodontic pacifiers soothe baby, promote oral development, and smooth transitions from breast to pacifier and back. NUK baby and toddler trainer cups, straw cups, and sippy cups are made for easy transitions from bottle to cup. NUK baby and toddler tableware makes mealtime simple, from baby’s first bite to toddler’s independent eating. NUK milk storage bags and nursing pads help support your breastfeeding journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are literally the ONLY bottles I use. The bottle doesn’t feel like flimsy plastic and the nipple is easily detachable and easily washable. Also very easy for baby to grip when they start to hold the bottle up to feed themselves thanks to the design. And the temperature regulation makes it so you can put boiling hot water into them without damage when making formula. The PERFECT baby bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute "girl" bottles
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as a gift for my niece in law who is having a little girl. She had the clear Nuk bottles with green writing on her registry list. However, when I saw these bottles with the pink, mauve and white hearts on them, I had to get them instead because I thought they were much cuter for a little girl. If she still prefers the boring clear with the green writing, she can always exchange them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love the NUK brand. They never disappoint. These are easy to use and easy to clean. It is the perfect size and our kid is able to hold it herself with ease. Only downside is the bottle leaks if the lid is not on so if you lose lids don't buy these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best while breastfeeding to avoid nipple confusion
reviews.reviewText: If you are breastfeeding and bottle feeding and want to avoid nipple confusion these are literally the best out there. Because of the bottle nipple design and how it flattens out like a natural breast would it doesn't allow for confusion. It also has multiple holes just as a mothers breast has for identical fluid flow. I have heard nightmare stories about babies not wanting breast after bottle feeding as well as not wanted bottle after breast feeding. These allowed us to do both, no matter time of day, all the way up to 8 months old when I weaned our daughter due to biting issues and me scaring her when I let out a loud scream. So she no longer wanting to latch, which was heartbreaking. But from birth to 8 months these were amazing. They grow with baby and have slow, medium, and fast flow nipple options. Daughter now 9 months old we are still using the bottles and have them all switched to fast flow. I believe there are sippy cup tops for them too. As well as handles to attach to the bottom to help us transition to toddler years. Highly recommend. They are also easy to clean even in dishwasher and do not get that filmy color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nipples too high flow
reviews.reviewText: Kinda strange, these nipples are higher flow than our other Nuk bottles. Says they are the same ones, but definitely flow way too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter LOVES these!
reviews.reviewText: Only bottles my daughter will take she loves the natural feel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product but it is not glass lol
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product just thought it was glass...We have the glass ones and we prefer glass even if glass doesn't last us. We only have 1 glass Nuk bottle left so we bought these with 6 thinking it was the glass. We don't have anymore bottles and we do well on the only one we have left...sadly, for us..we will return and get the glass ones. Also because 1 won't do for two babies. Trust me when I say glass won't last you, they expensive and they do just as well as plastic but they heavy and baby cannot feed themselves with them because they will break it. I never let my child touch the glass ones but it is our preferred bottle.back to these plastic Nuk bottles I accidentally purchased... Nothing is wrong with them! They are in perfect condition. Just as my glass bottles came in. You have to wash them and is all good!
Good bottles. Crystal clear plastic, for now.

Easy to use anti-colic bottle out there with no extra parts. I love that the bottles stays crystal clear and does not cloud overtime, and the capacity to hold 150ml is great compare to other brand that holds 120ml only. The only con is that the measuring lines are hard to see when filling up the bottles with liquid formula or milk. I wish the markings are in darker shade as it contrast better with the color of the milk.
